text.description: bus - The password for the ldap server.

text.label: prop.pGeneral.gldap.tldapuser.label

text.description: bus - Indicates whether or not the LDAP uses SSL.
text.label: prop.pGeneral.gbus.tbusldapprocessorssl.label

text.description: Specifies the WsAppServer handler to be used. Valid values are: xas - Ws-Appserver files in <CORDYS_HOME> wsappserver - Ws-Appserver files in XMLStore (Cordys C2 and later). This is default.

text.description: Path of the project release repository where all release build contents will be copied. By default this is a local path but for shared projects this should be a location on a file server, e.g. \\my-server\shared-location elease-repository. If this property is not set, release builds are not copied.

text.description: This property indicates whether or not the project is under subversion. When this property is set all svn tasks will be executed. To indicate a project that is not under subversion remove this property.
